sentence.text: Patient 3 is the first child born to healthy, non-consanguineous Argentinian parents.
Prenatal ultrasound showed a cystic hygroma at 14 weeks’ gestation.
She was born at term with a birth weight of 3.865 kg (90th centile), a length of 48 cm (50th centile), and a head circumference of 34 cm (50th centile).
She was also diagnosed with generalized edema and ascites at birth.
A complex, multi-sutural craniosynostosis was diagnosed shortly after birth.
Surgical correction was undertaken at 3 and 8 months of age.
Bilateral conductive hearing loss was detected at the age of 3 months.
Chromosome analysis showed a normal female karyotype (46,XX).
She has been otherwise healthy, and her psychomotor development and growth are normal.
